text: Ana kwali Ajula (Allah) jwaakuujiimila ntima uliose pa yaupanganyisye (kuti taachiulipila, ngaŵa nijwali jwakuŵajilwa kun’galagatila)? Ni am’biichiile Allah ŵakamusyangana nao. Jilani: “Mwakolangani (ŵakamusyangana naowo).” Kapena nkuntagulila Jwalakwe yangakuimanyilila pa chilambo, kapena (n’gamba kuŵecheta) maloŵe gapachanyape (ngaŵa gakuumila pasi pa ntima)? Nambo kuti gasalalisyidwe kwa aŵala ŵakanile malindi gao, ni asiŵilidwe kwitala (lyagoloka). Sano jwannechelele Allah kupotela, basi nganakola nkun’jongola
